name: Only One In Time
description:
You are a smart boy who make games one day something went wrong and you found yourself in your game,  Kabukiland. You have to destroy your creations in order to come back to the world but you have one advantage you can stop time for a limited amount of time also you have a gun butt still you have ONLY ONE bullet tho. If i were you i would grab bullet and kill enemies with it or be a pacifist and go straight to the end. choice is yours.

  • W A S D for controls
  • Left Ctrl For Crouch
  • Left Shift for Sprint
  • Left Click to shoot
  • Right click to grab something (Bullet, you should be too close it won't work if you to close to bullet and you must hold.)
  • And Thank you all for looking and maybe downloading our game this is our teams first game jam and also first game. We're currently working on a bigger project called "Enter the Open Door". We were working with Unity for about 5 - 6 month and we want to test ourselves in Unreal Engine 4 (btw this is our first experience with Unreal Engine 4 ) so be sure to make comment. With your comments we're going to improve ourselves and also we've made this game in approximately 28 hours or so.
